content:
Kayli's  tablet has a cracked screen. On a coordinate map of the screen, the crack starts at the point $(1,3)$ and ends at the point $(10,3)$. The crack connects the two points in a straight line.

**Plot the points where the crack starts and ends on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How long is the crack?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] units
